title: Poster, "Commemorative Poster: Ame", 1976
medium:
Offset lithograph
Support: coated white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted in red ink at UL:Americans Step into Space; at CL in red ink, list of space craft in chronological order: Freedom 7/ 5/561 Shepard. FirstAmerican in Space...Apollo 17 (CM-America; LM-Challenger)/ 12/7-19/72 Cernan, Evans, Schmitt. Landed in /Taurus-Littrow region; Jack Schmitt...; at LL: National Air and Space Museum/ Design: Miho. Scale of Moon photo:4"=20 miles approx./ 1976 Smithsonian Institution Printed in USA
description: "Imprinted in red ink at UL:Americans Step into Space; at CL in red ink, list of space craft in chronological order: Freedom 7/ 5/561 Shepard. participants.person_name: National Air & Space Museum, Smithsonian Institution
